# infisical_identity_token_auth_token (Resource)

Create and manage identity token auth token in Infisical.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `identity_id` (String) The ID of the identity to create a token for

### Optional

- `name` (String) The name of the token auth token

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The UTC timestamp of the created at date.
- `id` (String) The ID of the token auth token
- `is_revoked` (Boolean) A flag indicating token has been revoked
- `number_of_uses` (Number) The number of times that the token is used
- `number_of_uses_limit` (Number) The maximum number of times that the token can be used; a value of 0 implies infinite number of uses. Default: 0
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The token.
- `ttl` (Number) The lifetime for the token in seconds. Default: 0 - not expiring
